aria-label.description: Adds an accessible label to the list.

children.description: Anything that can be rendered inside of the list (React component or element)

className.description: Additional classes added to the list

component.description: Sets the type of the list component.

iconSize.description: Modifies the size of the icons in the list

isBordered.description: Modifies the list to add borders between items

isPlain.description: Modifies the list to include plain styling

type.description: Sets the way items are numbered if component is set to "ol". (Type: OrderType)
